3.name: Peddler
3.text: "Oh, Sol-sama! I'm glad to see you!"

4.name: Sol
4.text: "Oh, hello! You seem to be doing well!!"

5.name: Peddler
5.text:
"Yes, thanks to you. By the way... I have a favor
to ask of you, Sol-sama..."

11.name: Peddler
11.text:
"I want to go peddling to the village beyond the
mountain, but there are no guards passing by at
the moment."

12.name: Peddler
12.text:
"I know it's quite impolite to make such a
request... but would you please accompany me to
the village, Sol-sama?"

13.name: Eric
13.text:
"Hmm, so it's about being a guard. Certainly,
right now, the adventurers who could help out are
all away..."

15.name: Eric
15.text:
"Sol-chan, at least make a show of thinking it
over a bit more."

16.name: Peddler
16.text:
"Oh, thank you very much...!! Please let me know
when you're ready..."

21.text: Scene: Mountain Dungeon Encounter with Kobolds

27.name: Adventurer
27.text:
"...What's this? They look like they're
prostrating themselves, but..."

29.name: Eric
29.text:
"They don't seem hostile, but... are they trying
to communicate something...?"

31.name: Sol
31.text:
"They're saying, 'Please help us, Dragon-sama!' in
Dragon language!"

34.name: Eric
34.text: "Don't pout just because it's a joke."

38.name: Sol
38.text: "The kobolds were living in this mountain's cave."

39.name: Sol
39.text:
"However, recently, a bad 'manticoa' has taken up
residence, forcing the kobolds to prostrate
themselves."

40.name: Sol
40.text:
It seems they're saying, "At this rate, this
mountain will become its possession. Please, help
us!" in Dragon language!

43.name: Adventurer
43.text:
"A wicked magical beast with a human face and a
beast's body, huh. Well, I can't just leave it
be... If this mountain path is destroyed, the
villages ahead will be in trouble too."

44.name: Sol
44.text:
"Understood!! First, let's escort the merchant to
the village, and then prepare to exterminate the
manticore!!"

45.name: Eric
45.text:
"If we don't go through the Adventurer's Guild to
make it an official request, we might miss out on
our reward... you know!"
